name: UrbanFit
overview: Bold, inclusive activewear brand designed for the modern city athlete. We create performance wear that transitions seamlessly from the gym to the street, empowering Gen Z women to own their fitness journey with confidence and style.
targetAudience: Gen Z women aged 18-28 who are passionate about fitness, self-expression, and sustainability. Active on social media, values authenticity and inclusivity.

voice.tone: Energetic, motivational, and unapologetically confident. We're your hype squad cheering you on.
examples: Your workout, your rules. This set was made for every body ready to crush it.
From sunrise runs to late-night gym sessionsâ€”we've got you, bestie.

doStatements: Always use inclusive and body-positive language
Feature diverse models and real customers
Connect fitness to mental health and empowerment
Use trendy Gen Z language authentically
dontStatements: Never use diet culture language or before/after imagery
Don't make unrealistic body transformation promises
Avoid gendered stereotypes about women and fitness
Never use outdated slang that feels forced

metadata.name: Maya
metadata.description: Confident young woman in activewear, urban setting
